overview: Ismael is not doing very well lately. He is a screenwriter in his low hours, has gained twenty kilos, his girlfriend left him and his accounts are zero. All he needed was to witness a violent robbery and be pressured by police to identify a dangerous offender, which in turn intimidates him not to do so. Then he meets Deborah, a young prostitute who has not lost all the innocence and a natural sweetness, which is for Ismael the closest thing to redemption. But the commissioner Iturrioz does not rest ...
title: Un mundo casi perfecto
